attributes.action: Give Men More Time Off For Paternity Leave
attributes.additional_details: men don’t get the time to bond enjoy their other children and have time with their significant others. They go back exhausted 💤 they should be entitled to more time to get into a new routine and have quality time with their families not just exsisting and making it though a sleepless night and then having to work all day too! It’s not fair give men more quality time with families men can get post natal depression too
attributes.background: Since having my newborn I’ve realised how hard it is juggling life with 2 children. My eldest son is autistic and my newborn needs a lot of time too. My husband has had 2 weeks off with us and is now back to work he’s gone back exhausted tired and not sure what day it is. They should get more time
